mapper.insert: insert into spu ( spu_name, spu_thumburl, spu_price, spu_title, spu_introduction, spu_warningstock, spu_maxbuy, spu_unit, spu_status, createtime, updatetime, spu_brand_id, spu_category_id, spu_stock )values( #{bo.spu_name}, #{bo.spu_thumburl}, #{bo.spu_price}, #{bo.spu_title}, #{bo.spu_introduction}, #{bo.spu_warningstock}, #{bo.spu_maxbuy}, #{bo.spu_unit}, #{bo.spu_status}, #{bo.createtime}, #{bo.updatetime}, #{bo.spu_brand_id}, #{bo.spu_category_id}, #{bo.spu_stock} )
